info.smart_tools.smartactors.core.postgres_schema.search

Class PostgresQueryWriterResolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • info.smart_tools.smartactors.core.postgres_schema.search.PostgresQueryWriterResolver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    QueryWriterResolver

    public class PostgresQueryWriterResolver
extends Object
implements QueryWriterResolver
    Resolves writers of query for Postgres database and jsonb documents.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PostgresQueryWriterResolver()
      Creates the resolver to convert criteria into request to jsonb documents.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addQueryWriter(String name, QueryWriter writer)
      Registers new query writer.
      QueryWriter resolve(String name)
      Returns the writer to write the specific query condition identified by the key
      FieldPath resolveFieldName(String name)
      Resolves valid field path in dotted notation ('a.b') to jsonb notation ('document#>{a,b}').

    • Method Detail

      • addQueryWriter

        public void addQueryWriter(String name,
                           QueryWriter writer)
        Registers new query writer.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the operator in the query criteria, for example '$eq' or '$and'
        writer - new writer to register

      • resolveFieldName

        public FieldPath resolveFieldName(String name)
                           throws QueryBuildException
        Resolves valid field path in dotted notation ('a.b') to jsonb notation ('document#>{a,b}').
        Parameters:
        name - name of field path in dotted notation from the criteria.
        Returns:
        a FieldPath object with valid field path
        Throws:
        QueryBuildException - when field path is invalid

      • resolve

        public QueryWriter resolve(String name)
                    throws QueryBuildException
        Description copied from interface: QueryWriterResolver
        Returns the writer to write the specific query condition identified by the key
        Specified by:
        resolve in interface QueryWriterResolver
        Parameters:
        name - key in key-value pair of condition object. May be an operator name ('$and', '$eq', '$lt', etc..), field path ('parent.child', for example) or null for default operator
        Returns:
        ConditionWriter found for this condition key
        Throws:
        QueryBuildException - if something goes wrong
